issue.title: can't add block list https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers.txt to adguard android
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Android ### AdGuard version 4.12.2 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed analytics or tracker ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers.txt ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List ### Security Phishing URL Blocklist ### Other AdGuard Experimental filter ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I just can't add this particular block list to the android app even though I added it to my router running adguard home with no issue. I've tried saving the file and uploading it and I've tried viewing the list in raw and copy and pasting address...both ways fail and I don't know why. I don't know how to add a screen shot but the message simply says to enter a valid URL or file path. 2. Screenshots
:
Screenshot N:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: athome.fandango.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://athome.fandango.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fathome.fandango.com)
### Comment
> i have an asus router. it has adguard as a feature. when i enable adguard in asus and connect to the router profile i created in the adguard dns, i cannot open the website athomefandango.com. if i disable adguard in asus, then i can view athome.fandango.com without problems. i have turned off blocklists and security in adguard dns server setting and still cannot view athome.fandango.com correctly. i have also added athome.fandango.com in the user rules as an allowed website and still cannot view athome.fandabgo.com website correctly. this whole issue started sometime last year and so i turned off adguard in my asus router. when i first used adguard i did not have this problem. i want to use the parental control section of adguard to block my kids from unwanted web content.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/hh1r8axuzi80kocc0s8kc8sw0goswg4dybbr3u3tzk.jpg?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/t6bfht2m7j4gows448gsoggks0sgo4wsioy2y3xcb4.jpg?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Device or router settings
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `windows 11 home, version 25h2`
Browser: | Safari

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
Wygląda na ten sam problem co tutaj - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/223710#issuecomment-3817598342
Dodaj proszę do reguł użytkownika:
```adblock
streamup.ws,strmup.*#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'script', 'googima.js')
streamup.ws,strmup.*#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'EventTarget.prototype.addEventListener', '/blocker|detected/'))
```

comment.body:
Looks like duplicate of https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/223710, though it looks like that currently anti-adblock script is removed.

Anyway if you still can reproduce then, please add following rules to user rules:
```adblock
streamup.ws,strmup.*#%#//scriptlet('prevent-element-src-loading', 'script', 'googima.js')
streamup.ws,strmup.*#%#//scriptlet('abort-current-inline-script', 'EventTarget.prototype.addEventListener', '/blocker|detected/'))
```
Unfortunately MV3 extension cannot update filters due to Google policy, so new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates.

issue.title: Homepage where advertisements are displayed

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

AdGuard for Android v2.8.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://rakuten.dropgame.jp/drop/play/top

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Japanese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>I called inquiry number 1147661 and everything was fine until now, but
when I run the game on the website below, ads start appearing.
The game operator responded the day before yesterday.
I've enabled and disabled various filters, but the ads still appear.
Sometimes they appear randomly, and they never go away.

Link:
https://rakuten.dropgame.jp/drop/play/top

→ Since this is a Rakuten game, after creating an account, go to the following link:
https://pointmall.rakuten.co.jp/

Go to "Earn through games" → "Pukupuku Lagoon" → "Start now."
(「ゲームで貯める」→「ぷくぷくラグーン」→「今すぐ
スタート」)

Link:
https://rakuten.wamgame.jp/whack/top

→ Go to the following link:
https://pointmall.rakuten.co.jp/

Go to "Earn through games" → "Pokopoko Whack-a-Mole" → "Start now."
(「ゲームで貯める」→「ぽこぽこもぐらたたき」→「今すぐ
スタート」)

Thank you for your cooperation.


2. Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://athome.fandango.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fathome.fandango.com)
### Comment
> i have an asus router. it has adguard as a feature. when i enable adguard in asus and connect to the router profile i created in the adguard dns, i cannot open the website athomefandango.com. if i disable adguard in asus, then i can view athome.fandango.com without problems. i have turned off blocklists and security in adguard dns server setting and still cannot view athome.fandango.com correctly. i have also added athome.fandango.com in the user rules as an allowed website and still cannot view athome.fandabgo.com website correctly. this whole issue started sometime last year and so i turned off adguard in my asus router. when i first used adguard i did not have this problem. i want to use the parental control section of adguard to block my kids from unwanted web content.

### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://athome.fandango.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fathome.fandango.com)
### Comment
> i have an asus router. it has adguard as a feature. when i enable adguard in asus and connect to the router profile i created in the adguard dns, i cannot open the website athomefandango.com. if i disable adguard in asus, then i can view athome.fandango.com without problems. i have turned off blocklists and security in adguard dns server setting and still cannot view athome.fandango.com correctly. i have also added athome.fandango.com in the user rules as an allowed website and still cannot view athome.fandabgo.com website correctly. this whole issue started sometime last year and so i turned off adguard in my asus router. when i first used adguard i did not have this problem. i want to use the parental control section of adguard to block my kids from unwanted web content.

### Screenshots

  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/hh1r8axuzi80kocc0s8kc8sw0goswg4dybbr3u3tzk.jpg?nc=1)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://rakuten.dropgame.jp/drop/play/top](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frakuten.dropgame.jp%2Fdrop%2Fplay%2Ftop) ### Comment > 件名：広告が表示されるホームページ > > AdGuard.com御中 > > いつもお世話になってます。 > > お問い合わせ番号「1147661」で今まではよかったのですが、 > 下記のホームページでゲームを実行すると、広告が表示され > てしまいます。一昨日にゲーム運営会社が対応してきました。 > フィルタをいろいろ有効/無効に設定しましたが、広告が表示 > されたり、空欄になったりして、無くなりませんでした。 > > リンク： > https://rakuten.dropgame.jp/drop/play/top > > → 楽天ゲームなので、アカウントを作った上で、下記リンク > https://pointmall.rakuten.co.jp/ > から、「ゲームで貯める」→「ぷくぷくラグーン」→「今すぐ > スタート」、で表示されます。 > > リンク： > https://rakuten.wamgame.jp/whack/top > > → 下記リンク > https://pointmall.rakuten.co.jp/ > から、「ゲームで貯める」→「ぽこぽこもぐらたたき」→「今すぐ > スタート」、で表示されます。 > > よろしくお願い致します。 > > ### Screenshots
